scripts.build: pnpm --filter minions-prompts run build && pnpm --filter minions-prompts-cli run build && pnpm --filter minions-prompts-docs run build
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter minions-prompts run build && pnpm --filter minions-prompts run lint && pnpm --filter minions-prompts-cli run lint
scripts.deploy:docs: pnpm --filter minions-prompts-docs run build && netlify deploy --dir apps/docs/dist --prod --no-build
